message: Let's start fair.  I'll take the lion's share this time, but I'm open to negotiations in the future.
You took the lion's share last time, now it's my turn. I'm willing to compromise.
Let's be reasonable. I'm willing to give up some of my share, but I'm not going to be taken advantage of.
I'm not going to give you the majority, but I'm willing to meet you halfway.
